trends: There have been 53 other sightings in Rochester
There were no other sightings in Rochester on or around September 5th 1977
Summary: my 3 siblings and I saw this-stopped the car and observed for 15 minutes we think because we seemed to loose 15 minutes of time
divs: Sighting DetailsMy 3 siblings and I were driving down the road , when all of a sudden we noticed a bright light over the river. we stopped and got out of vehicle and watch it hover then zig zag out of sight in the blink of an eye. as we were talking about it . we noticed that we had lost approximatley 15 minutes of time. the crazy thing is none of us ever discussed it after that night until recently. as it seems our memeory is better now than the day after. WEIRD.
